com.polarion.platform.persistence

Interface ICustomFieldsService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICustomFieldsProvider

    public interface ICustomFieldsService
extends ICustomFieldsProvider
    Extension of ICustomFieldsProvider which is aware of conditionally defined custom fields.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ANNOTATION_KEY_CONTROL_FIELD
      Prototype annotation key, which defines the field name, whose value can switch between different custom field sets.
      static java.lang.String ANNOTATION_KEY_DEFINITION_FILE
      Prototype annotation key, which defines the location of custom fields configuration file for that prototype.

      • Fields inherited from interface com.polarion.subterra.base.data.model.ICustomFieldsProvider

        CONFLICT_PREFIX

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ICustomField getCustomField(IPObject instance, java.lang.String featureId)
      Like ICustomFieldsProvider.getCustomField(String, String, com.polarion.subterra.base.data.identification.IContextId), but based on given instance (properly works with conditional custom fields).
      java.util.Collection<ICustomField> getCustomFields(java.lang.String prototypeName, IContextId contextId, java.lang.String controlValue)
      Collects all custom fields for specified prototype and control value.
      java.util.Collection<ICustomFieldType> getCustomFieldTypesFor(java.lang.String prototypeName)
      Gets all selectable types for custom fields for object of given prototype
      java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getValidCustomFieldIds(IPObject instance)

    • Method Detail

      • getValidCustomFieldIds

        @NotNull
java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getValidCustomFieldIds(@NotNull
                                                                       IPObject instance)
        Parameters:
        instance -
        Returns:
        The list of String id of custom fields, which are configured for the given instance. This includes the conditional ones, based on the object field values.

      • getCustomField

        @NotNull
ICustomField getCustomField(@NotNull
                                     IPObject instance,
                                     @NotNull
                                     java.lang.String featureId)
        Like ICustomFieldsProvider.getCustomField(String, String, com.polarion.subterra.base.data.identification.IContextId), but based on given instance (properly works with conditional custom fields).
        Parameters:
        instance - instance (not null)
        featureId - custom field id (not null)
        Returns:
        custom field definition (not null)

      • getCustomFields

        @NotNull
java.util.Collection<ICustomField> getCustomFields(@NotNull
                                                            java.lang.String prototypeName,
                                                            @NotNull
                                                            IContextId contextId,
                                                            @Nullable
                                                            java.lang.String controlValue)
        Collects all custom fields for specified prototype and control value. If control value is specified only type-specific fields will be collected, otherwise only non type-specific fields will be collected.
        Parameters:
        prototypeName -
        contextId -
        controlValue -
        Since:
        3.6.2

      • getCustomFieldTypesFor

        @NotNull
java.util.Collection<ICustomFieldType> getCustomFieldTypesFor(@NotNull
                                                                       java.lang.String prototypeName)
        Gets all selectable types for custom fields for object of given prototype
        Parameters:
        prototypeName - the prototype of the object, cannot be null
        Since:
        3.8.3
